cms.tag: 2010/12/20 The Lift team is proud to announce version 2.2-RC4 of Lift

div.div:
Lift 2.2-RC4
December 20, 2010
The Lift team is pleased to announce Lift 2.2-RC4 with three tickets closed since Lift 2.2-RC3.
This is the fourth release candidate in the 2.2-RC* series following up on Lift 2.2-RC1, Lift 2.2-RC2, and Lift 2.2-RC3.
We are getting close! Please test this and help us identify bugs so that we can make Lift 2.2 awesome!
Thank you, have fun!
- The Lift team
